description.body: This patch we’re charging in and bringing Hecarim to the Rift! Everyone’s favorite Star Guardian girlies are also making their return, and we’ve got your regularly scheduled balance updates. Welcome to Patch 4.3c!

category.title: Game Updates

description.body: With Vladimir recently joining the Rift, we wanted to share him and some of our other favorite Mid Laners in this month's paintovers!

description.body: We’re taking a look at the meta since our overhaul of the rune system and making some adjustments to some champions who needed some help to find their footing, and those who have been toeing the line. We also have the addition of the Mecha skinline, the return of the Stargazers, and a new Wild Pass! Welcome to Patch 4.3b!

category.title: Game Updates

description.body: Thirsty for something a bit more sinister? Make your enemies see red with Vladimir, The Crimson Reaper, on August 17th UTC.

description.body: Annie’s rework is right around the corner! We’re beary excited about it and can’t wait to play it in our games. But before it goes live, read more about it from our dev team in this month’s Wild Rift News!

description.body: Vladimir joins the fight this patch, Annie’s rework is almost here, ghost Poros, and of course balance updates! Welcome to Patch 4.3a!

description.body: We’re celebrating the launch of Soul Fighter with a new mode, event, and skins! Plus we’re revamping our rune system and so much more! Welcome to Patch 4.3—The Fighting Spirit Update!

description.body: Patch 4.3 is right around the corner, we’ve got you covered with a rundown of all the content coming during our Fighting Spirit Update!

description.body: Welcome to the ring for Patch 4.3: Fighting Spirit with David and a new face from the Wild Rift team: John! Joining the bout are three brand new champions, exciting revamps, the Soul Fighter event, and two new Wild Passes making their Rift debut. Get ready to rumble on July 18th!

description.body: Welcome to the last balance patch of the Playhem patch! We’re making some more adjustments to marksmen and a few other champions to balance out the meta and groovin’ to the beat with the arrival of Space Groove skins!

description.body: This patch we’ve got our bows and arrows ready and are envisioning our way to a chilly victory…with soda pop for the reward! We’ve got the long awaited marksman update, Swain, Ice Dragon, the arrival of a new Wild Pass, and more!

description.body: Get ready for Patch 4.2: Playhem with David and Maddy from the Wild Rift team! We’re bringing the fire, ice, and everything not-nice with our champions, a cool new dragon, and more, coming May 26 00:01 UTC. Tune into this Patch Preview for every detail.

title: TL;DW: Dev Update: Patch Schedule, Champions, and Gameplay Changes

description.body: Class is in session—Welcome to Patch 4.0c! It's the last balance patch for 4.0! We have some adjustments to a few champions and the release of Battle Academia Leona and Battle Principal Yuumi!

description.body: Electrify the Rift—It’s Patch 4.0b! Zeri makes her arrival, along with new PROJECT skins and the PROJECT: SURGE event! Two game modes return, and balance updates across the Rift!

description.body: We’re launching two new mechanics, base burning and inhibitor respawns as well as balance updates across the Rift! Welcome to Patch 4.0a!

description.body: It’s time zip and zap into Wild Rift’s first patch of the year! Zoe makes her debut, All Random Ultra Rapid Fire (ARURF) mode returns, Lunar New Year celebrations, Ranked S8, a new Wild Pass, and much more! Welcome to Patch 4.0!

category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Every fold and cut brings us one step closer to a paper masterpiece! Show off your creativity with Mythmaker Gwen, Caitlyn, Zoe, Camille, and Seraphine on January 12 UTC.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body:
Come revel in the celebration with delectable food!

Team up to cook delicious dishes in Lunar Feast, and earn rewards as you serve them to some familiar faces from Mythmaker. The first order comes in on January 12 UTC!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It's time to celebrate Lunar New Year! We’re giving a rundown of what's to come in Patch 4.0 and sharing some of the updates we’ll be bringing to celebrate the New Year with you!

description.body: Oh deer, it’s the last patch of the year! Welcome to 3.5b! Never fear, there’s still plenty to fawn over this with the arrival of Lillia, an adventure into the spirit realm, snowball fights with our favorite poro pals, and of course some balance updates!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Before Lillia prances onto the Rift, join Riot RogueFool to learn some tips, tricks, and why she’s worth fawning over!

category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: ChromaCrash Samira, Jinx, and Ekko make their arrival. We also have balance updates across the Rift, including some for One For All—Welcome to Patch 3.5a!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Slip through the shadows and slash your opponents with Kayn and Aatrox! Play as 5 Yuumi’s and pounce all over your foes in the new game mode One For All! We also have new items, runes, balance changes, as well as updates to the jungle! Welcome to Patch 3.5!

description.body: In this edition of Wild Rift News, we’re giving a run down of what's to come in Patch 3.5 before the Patch Notes notes come out as well as some updates on the new content from our dev team!

description.body: It’s time for the last balance patch of 3.4! Hunt down your foes and wreak havoc in the jungle, when we unleash Warwick onto the Rift this patch! We also have some balance updates before we close out 3.4 and head into 3.5!

description.body: There’s nowhere to run. Hunt down your prey with Warwick, the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun. Coming November 4 UTC.

description.body: It’s time for the Power Spike Party! While we’re ready to celebrate with some goodies, we’re also making some adjustments to the support quest items, Gwen and some other champions across the map. Welcome to 3.4a!

category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: You’ll be a cut above the rest when Gwen and Yone join the Rift this patch…just be careful when you’re out there running around with scissors and fighting your inner demons. We also have a new game mode, items, enchants, Wild Pass, and loads more. Welcome to Patch 3.4!

category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: In the first edition of Wild Rift News, we’re recapping and diving deeper into all the content we announced in the Patch 3.4 Preview. And revealing some other updates headed onto the Rift in the month of September!

title: Hextech Chests are coming to Wild Rift

description.body: Over the past few patches we’ve been looking for new ways for players to earn new content, starting in Patch 3.4 we’ll start rolling out a new way to do just that in some regions.
